meanings.definition: A Mexican dish made of mashed avocado mixed with chopped onion, tomatoes, chili peppers, and seasoning.
meanings.sent1: I love to eat guacamole with my tacos.
meanings.sent2: At the party, everyone enjoyed the guacamole with chips.
meanings.sent3: The guacamole at the restaurant was so good, it made me dance.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright and flavorful as a bowl of guacamole.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green color of the guacamole made it look like a garden on my plate.

meanings.definition: A dip made from avocados, usually served with tortilla chips.
meanings.sent1: Could you pass me the guacamole for the chips?
meanings.sent2: The guacamole was the perfect addition to the snack table.
meanings.sent3: The guacamole decided to take a dip in the pool of salsa.
meanings.sent4: The guacamole was a smooth companion to the crunchy chips.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the guacamole beckoned everyone to the table.
